__e: Hercules is my son, not yours.
Hercules has now become a greater threat. No longer as an enemy, but now as a friend.
Next to my boy, Hercules is the best friend I've ever had.
- The populous is all for Hercules!
I mean, without Hercules, they won't have anything to do.
Uh, Hercules, wouldn't the road be faster?
He went into that mine saying he was Hercules, and he never came out.
Hercules and I have been friends for a long time.
Now all we have to do is meet Hercules and send the message.
